Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-57979 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.180.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-57979 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.180.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
